sub_title: 24/7 Environmental Entrepreneur | Emergency Response | Hazardous Waste | Mercury Solutions | Hazmat Team | Oil Spill Response
summary:
I have over 20 years of environmental experience in various fields world wide.

In 2019 I started Envisor because I wanted to do business myself, to create my own environmental playing field with which I can support my (potential) customers in a valuable way in various environmental challenges.
I have a large network of specialists who understand the same philosophy as myself.

We are mainly specialized in Environmental Emergency Response, Chemical Waste, Hazardous Substances, Environmental Advice, Mercury Leaks and Spill Prevention, world wide.

At the end of 2020, we took over the activities of BTC (Eygelshoven Limburg) with regard to the 24/7 recovery of pressure containers, gas cylinders and / or cylinders. In addition, we now help many customers with carrying out "gas" related activities and processing pressure containers and residual gases.

In 2021 (March) we started Envisor B.V. we created more focus on Emergency Response, Chemical Waste and Gas Cylinders. We've build on a partnership with a gas cylinder processor IG&S in Belgium. Our Emergency Response network grows bigger then I could ever imagine. 

In 2022 (May) we took over the activities of A-GAS with regard to the service around Sulhurhexafluoride (SF6). We take care of the Wastestream SF6 in the Netherlands. 

In 2023 we found a partnership with Orion which  took over the SF6 Energy sector. Orion is now our SF6 processor. We still service Universities and Medical sector. 

What challenges we do like to take on:
- environmental emergencies world wide
- projects with chemical | hazardous waste 
- salvaging pressure containers, gas cylinders or cylinders
- projects with (chemical) gases
- projects with Mercury
- source of information for environmental questions
- clean up mercury in business or residential environment achieved more than 500 positive results.

education.field_of_study: ADR, RID, ADN, IATA, IMDG, PGS, WABO

profile_positions.description:
Envisor is the right place for practical advice on environmental legislation and regulations for companies, chemical (waste) substances (purchasing, process, storage, transport, collection and processing), spill prevention, organization and implementation of emergency organization and specialist cleaning.
We distinguish ourselves in real services at competitive rates.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Owner - Emergency Response Specialist - Environmental Advisor

profile_positions.description: Envisor Incident Response stands for 24/7 service in the event of incidents, calamities or unusual incidents (leaks, spills, hazardous (waste) substances, etc.). We work worldwide and have a large network of parties with the same philosophy. Do not be surprised by incidents, but be prepared! We are happy to help you, remote advice is often free!
profile_positions.title: Emergency Response Specialist

profile_positions.description: When mercury (metallic or powder) has leaked into your living or working environment, it is especially good to know that there is a party in the Netherlands that can perfectly clean up this hazardous substance, world wide!
profile_positions.title: Specialist Mercury Measuring & Cleaning
